node.excerpt: I just uploaded a first version of my cakephp scripts. Bakeme is a cakephp application skeleton with customized bake scripts, which enables you to create advanced, data-driven websites. Some of the features are: Pasword protected backend, based on users in the database Customized form helpers to add…

frontmatter.title: BakeMe –  Customized cakephp bake templates & application skeleton

node.excerpt: The first beta of the new version of SWX was released yesterday. This new version brings AS3 and Flash Player 10 support. I decided to update CakeSWXPHP, to support this new version of SWX. You can download a new version, from my CakeSWXPHP page.

Cakeswxphp enables you to use the cakphp rapid application framework as your remoting backend. No longer writing complex sqls, escaping query strings,… As some of you have noticed, cake does slow your remoting down a bit, as more classes are loaded to give you this ease-of-use. I did some benchmarks…

After some user input, I updated the cakeswxphp packages. I also started a branch which supports cakephp 1.2. There is a change in the gateway locations: you no longer connect to cake_swx_gateway.php or cake_amf_gateway.php, but to swx.php and amf.php (default locations in swx). This should make it…

So, you want to learn how to create a sexy blog in flash, creating posts, comments, database storage, …? Are you afraid of spending hours writing complex queries, parsing XML data or writing loads of php files? Don’t be, and see the power of cakephp and SWX combined. CakePHP being a rapid…

frontmatter.title: flash remoting with SWX and CakePHP
